non_blocking_issues.description: Duplicate fields across dataclasses - acceptable as different architectural layers
Over-verbose tests - still present but not blocking

assessment.r1_fixes: All 4 files modified are directly addressing R1/Q1/Q3 DB persistence issue
assessment.new_tests: 4 regression guard tests - appropriate for catching the data loss bug that was fixed

notes: Round 1 had no blocking issues. Round 2 fixes addressed a real gap (data loss). The fixes are minimal and necessary. Ready to merge.
